pre_install.header: What is the ShopId / ShopNumber you want to connect?
pre_install.help_title: How to find your shop Id?
pre_install.help_button: Need help finding your shop Id?
pre_install.help_text: You can find your shop Id, by clicking the your domain at the top left corner in the Lightspeed backoffice.
pre_install.contract.header: Before we make you part of the Bon Network, we want to inform you about:
pre_install.contract.terms: I agree to the above and have read and understood the terms and conditions and privacy disclaimer.
